entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 56 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
